data.title: Casper and the Angels: Boo Zoo
data.meta_description: Check out the exclusive TV Guide movie review and see our movie rating for Casper and the Angels: Boo Zoo
data.text:
1979

1 hr 0 mins

NR

Watchlist

Where to Watch

This video contains sixty animated minutes of adventure with Casper the friendly ghost. Casper and his pals Hairy Scary, Mini, and Maxi set out to capture crooks throughout the galaxy in "Space Circus," "Casper's Campout," "Something Fishy," "Gone to the Dogs," and "Champ for a Day." Watch and laugh as the little ghost outsmarts circus crooks, a Martian, and some seal-nappers. This video is recommended for children ages five to seven.
